email_body: Ina, Can you pull Tori K.'s and Martin Cuilla's resumes and past performance reviews from H.R. ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 09/06/2000 10:44 AM --------------------------- John J Lavorato@ENRON 09/06/2000 05:39 AM To: Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: The commercial support people that you and Hunter want to make commercial managers.
